   16: -module(connect_SUITE).
   17: 
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
   27: 
   28: -define(SECURE_USER, secure_joe).
   29: -define(CERT_FILE, "priv/ssl/fake_server.pem").
   30: -define(TLS_VERSIONS, ["tlsv1", "tlsv1.1", "tlsv1.2"]).
   31: 
   32: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   33: %% Suite configuration
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: 
   36: all() ->
   37:     AuthMods = mongoose_helper:auth_modules(),
   38:     case lists:member(ejabberd_auth_external, AuthMods) of
   39:         true ->
   40:             {skip, "Conf reload doesn't work correctly with sample external auth"};
   41:         _ ->
   42:             [{group, negative},
   43:              {group, pre_xmpp_1_0},
   44:              {group, starttls},
   45:              {group, tls},
   46:              {group, ciphers_default},
   47:              {group, 'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'}]
   48:     end.
   49: 
   50: groups() ->
   51:     [{negative, [], [bad_xml,
   52:                      invalid_host,
   53:                      invalid_stream_namespace]},
   54:      {pre_xmpp_1_0, [], [pre_xmpp_1_0_stream]},
   55:      {starttls, test_cases()},
   56:      {tls, generate_tls_vsn_tests()},
   57:      {ciphers_default, [], [clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers,
   58:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA',
   59:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA']},
   60:      {'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', [],
   61:       %% node2 accepts DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA exclusively (see ejabberd.cfg)
   62:       ['clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only']}].
   63: 
   64: test_cases() ->
   65:     generate_tls_vsn_tests() ++
   66:     [should_fail_with_sslv3,
   67:      should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls,
   68:      should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required].
   69: 
   70: suite() ->
   71:     escalus:suite().
   72: 
   73: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: %% Init & teardown
   75: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   76: 
   77: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   78:     Config0 = escalus:init_per_suite([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd, []}} | Config]),
   79:     Config1 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config0),
   80:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Config1),
   81:     assert_cert_file_exists(),
   82:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([?SECURE_USER, alice])).
   83: 
   84: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   85:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([?SECURE_USER, alice])),
   86:     restore_ejabberd_node(Config),
   87:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   88: 
   89: init_per_group(starttls, Config) ->
   90:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config,
   91:                              fun mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern/0),
   92:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
   93:     Config;
   94: init_per_group(tls, Config) ->
   95:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
   96:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
   97:     Users = proplists:get_value(escalus_users, Config, []),
   98:     JoeSpec = lists:keydelete(starttls, 1, proplists:get_value(?SECURE_USER, Users)),
   99:     JoeSpec2 = {?SECURE_USER, lists:keystore(ssl, 1, JoeSpec, {ssl, true})},
  100:     NewUsers = lists:keystore(?SECURE_USER, 1, Users, JoeSpec2),
  101:     lists:keystore(escalus_users, 1, Config, {escalus_users, NewUsers});
  102: init_per_group(ciphers_default, Config) ->
  103:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
  104:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  105:     [{c2s_port, 5222} | Config];
  106: init_per_group('node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', Config) ->
  107:      node2_rpccall(mongoose_cover_helper, start, [[ejabberd]]),
  108:     [{c2s_port, 5233} | Config];
  109: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  110:     Config.
  111: 
  112: end_per_group('node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', Config) ->
  113:     node2_rpccall(mongoose_cover_helper, analyze, []),
  114:     Config;
  115: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  116:     Config.
  117: 
  118: generate_tls_vsn_tests() ->
  119:     [list_to_existing_atom("should_pass_with_" ++ VSN)
  120:      || VSN <- ?TLS_VERSIONS].
  121: 
  122: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  123: %% Tests
  124: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  125: 
  126: bad_xml(Config) ->
  127:     %% given
  128:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  129:     %% when
  130:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_bad_xml(Spec),
  131:     %% then
  132:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  133:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  134:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  135:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"xml-not-well-formed">>, <<>>], Error),
  136:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  137: 
  138: invalid_host(Config) ->
  139:     %% given
  140:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  141:     %% when
  142:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_to_invalid_host(Spec),
  143:     %% then
  144:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  145:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  146:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  147:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"host-unknown">>, <<>>], Error),
  148:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  149: 
  150: invalid_stream_namespace(Config) ->
  151:     %% given
  152:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  153:     %% when
  154:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec),
  155:     %% then
  156:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  157:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"invalid-namespace">>, <<>>], Error),
  158:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  159: 
  160: pre_xmpp_1_0_stream(Config) ->
  161:     %% given
  162:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  163:     Steps = [
  164:              %% when
  165:              {legacy_stream_helper, start_stream_pre_xmpp_1_0},
  166:              {legacy_stream_helper, failed_legacy_auth}
  167:             ],
  168:     %% ok, now do the plan from above
  169:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
  170:     escalus_connection:stop(Conn).
  171: 
  172: should_fail_with_sslv3(Config) ->
  173:     %% GIVEN
  174:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  175:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, sslv3),
  176:     %% WHEN
  177:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1) of
  178:     %% THEN
  179:         _ ->
  180:             error(client_connected_using_sslv3)
  181:     catch
  182:         error:closed ->
  183:             ok
  184:     end.
  185: 
  186: should_pass_with_tlsv1(Config) ->
  187:     should_pass_with_tls(tlsv1, Config).
  188: 
  189: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.1'(Config) ->
  190:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.1', Config).
  191: 
  192: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.2'(Config) ->
  193:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.2', Config).
  194: 
  195: should_pass_with_tls(Version, Config)->
  196:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  197:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, Version),
  198: 
  199:     %% WHEN
  200:     Result = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1),
  201: 
  202:     %% THEN
  203:     ?assertMatch({ok, _, _, _}, Result).
  204: 
  205: should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls(Config) ->
  206:     %% GIVEN
  207:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  208:     {Conn, Props, Features} = start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec),
  209: 
  210:     %% WHEN
  211:     try escalus_session:authenticate(Conn, Props, Features) of
  212:     %% THEN
  213:         _ ->
  214:             error(authentication_without_tls_suceeded)
  215:     catch
  216:         throw:{auth_failed, User, AuthReply} ->
  217:             ?assertEqual(atom_to_binary(?SECURE_USER, utf8), User),
  218:             escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"policy-violation">>,
  219:                                              <<"Use of STARTTLS required">>],
  220:                            AuthReply)
  221:     end.
  222: 
  223: should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required(Config) ->
  224:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  225:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, [start_stream]),
  226:     Features = case escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, wait_for_features) of
  227:         #xmlel{name = <<"stream:features">>, children = Children} -> Children;
  228:         #xmlel{name = <<"features">>, children = Children} -> Children
  229:     end,
  230:     ?assertMatch([#xmlel{name = <<"starttls">>,
  231:                          children = [#xmlel{name = <<"required">>}]}],
  232:                  Features).
  233: 
  234: clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers(Config) ->
  235:     ?assert(length(ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)) > 0).
  236: 
  237: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA'(Config) ->
  238:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA",
  239:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  240: 
  241: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'(Config) ->
  242:     ?assertEqual(["DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA"],
  243:                  ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)).
  244: 
  245: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA'(Config) ->
  246:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA",
  247:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  248: 
  249: 
  250: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  251: %% Internal functions
  252: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  253: 
  254: c2s_port(Config) ->
  255:     case ?config(c2s_port, Config) of
  256:         undefined -> 5223;
  257:         Value -> Value
  258:     end.
  259: 
  260: ciphers_available_in_os() ->
  261:     CiphersStr = os:cmd("openssl ciphers 'ALL:eNULL'"),
  262:     [string:strip(C, both, $\n) || C <- string:tokens(CiphersStr, ":")].
  263: 
  264: ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config) ->
  265:     Port = c2s_port(Config),
  266:     lists:filter(fun(Cipher) ->
  267:                          openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port)
  268:                  end, ciphers_available_in_os()).
  269: 
  270: openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port) ->
  271:     PortStr = integer_to_list(Port),
  272:     Cmd = "echo '' | openssl s_client -connect localhost:" ++ PortStr ++
  273:         " -cipher " "\"" ++ Cipher ++ "\" 2>&1"
  274:         " | grep 'Cipher is " ++ Cipher ++ "'",
  275:     [] =/= os:cmd(Cmd).
  276: 
  277: restore_ejabberd_node(Config) ->
  278:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Config),
  279:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd).
  280: 
  281: assert_cert_file_exists() ->
  282:     ejabberd_node_utils:file_exists(?CERT_FILE) orelse
  283:         ct:fail("cert file ~s not exists", [?CERT_FILE]).
  284: 
  285: config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, Fun) ->
  286:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file([Fun()], Config).
  287: 
  288: mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern() ->
  289:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, tls,"}.
  290: 
  291: mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern() ->
  292:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, starttls_required,"}.
  293: 
  294: set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec, Version) ->
  295:     [{ssl_opts, [{versions, [Version]}]} | UserSpec].
  296: 
  297: start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec) ->
  298:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_compression],
  299:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec,
  300:                                                             ConnetctionSteps),
  301:     {Conn, Props, Features}.
  302: 
  303: connect_to_invalid_host(Spec) ->
  304:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_to_invalid_host}]),
  305:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  306: 
  307: connect_to_invalid_host(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  308:     escalus:send(Conn, escalus_stanza:stream_start(<<"hopefullynonexistentdomain">>,
  309:                                                    ?NS_JABBER_CLIENT)),
  310:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  311: 
  312: connect_with_bad_xml(Spec) ->
  313:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_with_bad_xml}]),
  314:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  315: 
  316: connect_with_bad_xml(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  317:     escalus_connection:send(Conn, #xmlcdata{content = "asdf\n"}),
  318:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  319: 
  320: connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec) ->
  321:     F = fun (Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  322:                 Start = stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(escalus_users:get_server([], Spec)),
  323:                 escalus:send(Conn, Start),
  324:                 {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}
  325:         end,
  326:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [F]),
  327:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  328: 
  329: stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(To) ->
  330:     legacy_stream_helper:stream_start(lists:keystore(stream_ns, 1, default_context(To),
  331:                                 {stream_ns, <<"obviously-invalid-namespace">>})).
  332: 
  333: default_context(To) ->
  334:     [{version, <<"version='1.0'">>},
  335:      {to, To},
  336:      {stream_ns, ?NS_XMPP}].
  337: 
  338: node2_rpccall(Module, Function, Args) ->
  339:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node),
  340:     rpc:call(Node, Module, Function, Args).
